shortDescription: During a local battle reenactment, a large force wearing {TEAM_TAR.FactionDef.Demonym} colors unexpectedly landed and disrupted the event. We've now been tasked with defending the settlement using the fully immersive --- and actually functional --- bases. Fortunately, the actors are equipped with real working units instead of props...which might explain why this reenactment is so realistic and attracts such a big crowd. Defence-in-Depth can be extremely long, come prepared for extended combat!
longDescription: The participants are going weapons-hot for this one, and hopefully we'll have a better outcome than the battle they're reenacting.

dialogueContent.words: The bases and military units in the reenactment aren't just props --- they're equipped with real, functional armaments.  This will enable us to defend the position while we wait for the next base to go online.
{MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.dialogue_show}We've put up a strategy lesson here --- {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} better be took notes.
{MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.dialogue_bookish}Here's hoping our deeds make it into the main text, not just the footnotes.
{MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.dialogue_generic}Let's see if they filmed me and my {MC.PlayerLances.TeamPilot_Random_Generic.UnitName} looking as awesome as we are.

So...our defense held long enough for the {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Demonym} reinforcements to reach the field.

I'm hearing they're adding this battle to the lineup for their next reenactment festival.
Here's hoping they share some of the royalties with us.
{MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.dialogue_generic}If they put it up in holovids, I get to pick who'll portray me!
We've come up short, though to be fair, any other commanders facing an enemy force this large would've ended up the same way

You've successfully repelled every attacker!

The locals want this battle to be the centerpiece of the next event.
We've received the go-ahead to move to Alpha Base and secure it.  A few turrets and units will be holding the line with you, Commander.
The last base is online, and our orders are to maintain this position until support gets here.  The actors' military gear has been readied and is set for use.
Heads up, Commander --- you've got hostile contacts inbound!
{MC.If.RandomPercentage.IsLessThanOrIs.99%}{MC.Modification.AddTo.EncounterTags.dialogue_enabled}|SKIPDIALOGUE|

{{MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.dialogue_enabled} AND {MC.If.PlayerLances.Speaker.HasTag.pilot_mechwarrior}}{MC.Modification.AddTo.EncounterTags.dialogue_show}Time to show these actors how it's done in the real world.

{{MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.dialogue_enabled} AND {MC.If.PlayerLances.Speaker.HasTag.pilot_gladiator}}{MC.Modification.AddTo.EncounterTags.dialogue_show}Time to show these actors how it's done in the real world.

{{MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.dialogue_enabled} AND {MC.If.PlayerLances.Speaker.HasTag.pilot_bookish}}{MC.Modification.AddTo.EncounterTags.dialogue_bookish}I'd prefer reading about this than actually being in the battle.
{{MC.If.Encounter.HasNoTag.dialogue_show} AND {MC.If.Encounter.HasNoTag.dialogue_bookish}}{MC.Modification.AddTo.EncounterTags.dialogue_generic}I really hope someone's filming this.
Radar's showing bogies approaching Alpha Base, Commander.
More trouble on the way!
{MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.dialogue_show}Commander {COMMANDER.Callsign}, this might be the right moment to roll out the strategy we talked about.
{MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.dialogue_show}Save it for later, {MC.PlayerLances.TeamPilot_Random_Show.DisplayName}.  We've got a fight, stay with me and follow my lead.
{MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.dialogue_show}Roger
{MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.dialogue_bookish}I can't help noticing this follows the same pattern described in a 20th-century treatise...and that's concerning.
{MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.dialogue_bookish}Stay focused, {MC.PlayerLances.TeamPilot_Random_Bookish.DisplayName}!  Check your six...
{MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.dialogue_generic}Hey {MC.PlayerLances.TeamPilot_Random_1.DisplayName}, do we have a say on how this is going to be edited afterwards?
{MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.dialogue_generic}Stay focused, {MC.PlayerLances.TeamPilot_Random_Generic.DisplayName}!  Check your six...
I hate to be bearer of bad news, but new hostiles are detected moving towards you.
Hostiles heading towards Charlie base!
Hostiles en route to Charlie base, intercept them, Commander!
New wave of hostiles inside the perimeter --- lock it down!
{MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.dialogue_show}Now, Commander?
{MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.dialogue_show}Go for it or don't, just keep your guard up.
{MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.dialogue_bookish}Uhâ€¦ is this what the Spartans went through?
{MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.dialogue_bookish}No time for that, {MC.PlayerLances.TeamPilot_Random_Bookish.DisplayName}, let's get going...
{MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.dialogue_generic}Time to unleash my trademark move. For {COMPANY.CompanyName}!!!
{MC.If.Encounter.HasTag.dialogue_generic}I swear, if you blow the {MC.PlayerLances.TeamPilot_Random_Generic.UnitName}'s actuator, it's on you.
The units in Alpha are loaded with live rounds, safeties off.
Safeties disengaged, live rounds loaded...let's rock and roll.
